Besides technical shortcomings of safety of e-mail, we can also consider the laws protecting confidentiality of its users:  •   After 180 days your e-mails on servers of the American post providers become the property of the USA. •   The research showed that 55% of the American employers read electronic correspondence of the employees. •   It is worth reading history of the Lavabit service which nowadays stopped the work which Edward Snowden used.
